item.title: Scaling Bitcoin Exchanges With Lightning And Lightning User Profiles
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/308/ Stephan Livera: Philip, welcome to the show. Philip Glazman: Hi, Stephan. Really excited to be here. Stephan Livera: So Philip, you’re at River, and River has a lot of really cool, interesting stuff going on technologically, and I’m sure you can tell us a little bit about that. Do you want to tell us a little bit about your background and how you got into the more technical side of Bitcoin?
